7.1. Product Page¶

In this section we will create the Product Page for our E-Commerce Website - MyZone.in

7.1.1. Requirement¶

Let us have a look on the basic requirement of this page :

Our final page would look like this :

Note: The colors in the above image may vary from actual output.

Web Page should have :

  1. Background of the page should be Orange.
  2. A Section heading, for ITEMS.
  3. A table which shows all the products under a specific category, fetches from the database.
  4. With each product, it’s Name and Price are displayed.
  5. To know more about the product, when the user clicks on the image of product, a pop-up shows up, which lists a detail description about the product.
  6. A buy button, which redirects the user to the Payment Page.
